Kafka & Realtime CDC in QAS & PRD

SOW states timestamp based CDC as batched extraction._x000a_Now it is realtime log based CDC extraction with Kafka which increases solution complexity. Also, Kafka is not part of Informatica or SAP application suite._x000a_'-Kafka installation_x000a_'-PowerExchange integration with Kafka_x000a_'-DES integration with Kafka
